testsuite.name: Scenario: Create and Update School Private Event

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create and Update School Private Event

testcase.name: And I wait until the calendar has been loaded
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create and Update School Private Event

testcase.name: And I clicked the calendar "month" view button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create and Update School Private Event

testcase.name: Then I assert the calendar displays the "month" view
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create and Update School Private Event

testcase.name: When I create a school calendar event "TestUpdateClassEvent" that starts "tomorrow at 2:00" and ends "6 days from today"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create and Update School Private Event

testcase.name: Then I see a calendar event "TestUpdateClassEvent"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create and Update School Private Event

testcase.name: And I see the organizer of the calendar event "TestUpdateClassEvent" is "System"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create and Update School Private Event

testcase.name: When I edit the calendar event "TestUpdateClassEvent" and set the description to "Updated"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create and Update School Private Event

testcase.name: Then I see a calendar event "TestUpdateClassEvent"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create and Update School Private Event

testcase.name: And I see the description of the calendar event "TestUpdateClassEvent" is "Updated"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create and Update School Private Event
